english: poria; medicinal herb; used in plant/herb names; tuckahoe

etymology.interpretation: 艹 signals a connection to plants or herbs, fitting its use in herb names. 令 supplies the pronunciation líng, while the overall meaning refers to an herb, notably poria in compounds like 茯苓.

parts.english: order; command; make; virtuous; surname (phonetic here)

examples.chinese: 中医常用茯苓(中醫常用茯苓)。
examples.english: Traditional Chinese medicine commonly uses poria.

examples.chinese: 我买了茯苓饼当点心(我買了茯苓餅當點心)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒ mǎi le fúlíng bǐng dāng diǎnxīn.
examples.english: I bought poria cakes as a snack.

examples.chinese: 这种药材以茯苓为主(這種藥材以茯苓為主)。
examples.pinyin: Zhè zhǒng yàocái yǐ fúlíng wéi zhǔ.
examples.english: This medicinal ingredient mainly uses poria.
